translation.Crio experiências memoráveis através da: I create memorable experiences through the web.
translation.Sou um desenvolvedor apaixonado por cria: I'm a developer passionate about creating accessible user interfaces that combine thoughtful design with functionality for 2 years. My strength lies in development, but I also master prototyping, creating experiences that not only look great, but are meticulously built for performance and usability.
translation.Ao longo da minha carreira, já trabalhei: Throughout my career, I've worked at a software house, done freelance projects, and participated in a volunteer project in the legal department.
translation.No meu tempo livre, gosto de ler, pratic: In my free time, I like to read, go for walks, work out and play games.
translation.Responsável por construir e manter o CRM: Responsible for building and maintaining the company's CRM, working together with developers and designers to merge functionality and elegance into a single project.
translation.Projeto social da área jurídica, benefic: Social project in the legal area, benefiting people who cannot afford a lawyer. I was in charge of the project's front-end.
translation.Website capaz de ler comentários de um v: Website capable of reading comments from a YouTube video and displaying the emotion expressed by each comment, through artificial intelligence, with more than 20 emotions available.
translation.Landing Page produzida para uma empresa: Landing Page produced for a sugar importing and exporting company. With a modern and functional design, and languages ​​in Portuguese, English and Spanish.
